item.title: Welcome the LiPDverse
item.description: Welcome to the LiPDverse! The LiPDverse has been around for awhile now, but we’ve redesigned the website, added a blog, and did a bit more, so if even if you’re a regular, this looks a bit new. So now that you’re here, what should you do? 1. Explore LiPD datasets We created the LiPDverse exists to be a simple and convenient way of accessing and exploring LiPD-formatted datasets. The primary way of doing this is by exploring the compilation projects hosted here.
